	//DisplayTime.java

	package BusinessLogic;

	public class DisplayTime extends State 
	{
		public void displayTime(Watch watch) 
		{
			System.out.println(watch.getHour() + ":" + watch.getMin());
		}

		@Override
		public void pressButtonA(Watch watch)
		{
			watch.setButtonA(true);
			watch.setState(new SetHour());
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			System.out.println("\nState is changed from Display Time to Set hour ");

		}

		@Override
		public void pressButtonB(Watch watch)
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
			watch.setButtonB(true);
			System.out.println("\nNo change will happen");
		}

	

	}

	//SetHour.java

	package BusinessLogic;

	public class SetHour extends State 
	{

		int h;
		@Override
		public void pressButtonA(Watch watch)
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			watch.setButtonA(true);
			watch.setState(new SetMin());
			System.out.println("\nState is changed from Set hour to Set minute ");
		}

		@Override
		public void pressButtonB(Watch watch) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
			watch.setButtonB(true);
			h=watch.getHour();
			h++;
			watch.setHour(h);
			System.out.println("\nHour is incremented by one");
			System.out.println("The changed time is : ");
			System.out.println(watch.getHour()+":"+watch.getMin());
		}
	}

	//SetMin.java

	package BusinessLogic;

	public class SetMin extends State {
		int m;
		@Override
		public void pressButtonA(Watch watch) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
			watch.setButtonA(true);
			watch.setState(new DisplayTime());
			System.out.println("\nState is changed from Set minute to Display Time ");
		}

		@Override
		public void pressButtonB(Watch watch) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
			watch.setButtonB(true);
			m=watch.getMin();
			m++;
			watch.setMin(m);
			System.out.println("\nMinute is incremented by one");
			System.out.println("The changed time is : ");
			System.out.println(watch.getHour()+":"+watch.getMin());
		}
	}

	//State.java

	package BusinessLogic;

	import BusinessLogic.Watch.*;

	public class State 
	{
		public void pressButtonA(Watch watch) 
		{
			System.out.println("\n State is changed");
		}

		public void pressButtonB(Watch watch)
		{
			System.out.println("\nNo change");

		}

	}

	//Watch.java

	package BusinessLogic;

	public class Watch 
	{
		private int hour;
		private int min;
		boolean ButtonA;
		boolean ButtonB;
		private State state;
	
		public Watch(int hour, int min, boolean buttonA, boolean buttonB,State state) 
		{
			super();
			this.hour = hour;
			this.min = min;
			ButtonA = buttonA;
			ButtonB = buttonB;
			this.state = state;
		}

		public int getHour() 
		{
			return hour;
		}

		public void setHour(int hour) 
		{
			this.hour = hour;
		}

		public int getMin() 
		{
			return min;
		}

		public void setMin(int min) 
		{
			this.min = min;
		}


		public boolean isButtonA() 
		{
			return ButtonA;
		}

		public void setButtonA(boolean buttonA) 
		{
			ButtonA = buttonA;
		}

		public boolean isButtonB() 
		{
			return ButtonB;
		}

		public void setButtonB(boolean buttonB) 
		{
			ButtonB = buttonB;
		}

		public State getState() 
		{
			return state;
		}

		public void setState(State state) 
		{
			this.state = state;
		}

		@Override
		public String toString() 
		{
			return "Watch [hour=" + hour + ", min=" + min + ", ButtonA=" + ButtonA
					+ ", ButtonB=" + ButtonB + ", state=" + state + "]";
		}	
	}

	//Test.java

	package Client;

	import BusinessLogic.DisplayTime;
	import BusinessLogic.SetHour;
	import BusinessLogic.SetMin;
	import BusinessLogic.Watch;

	public class Test 
	{
	
		public static void main(String[] args)
		{
			Watch watch = new Watch(1, 00, false, false, new SetMin());
			watch.getState().pressButtonA(watch);
			watch.getState().pressButtonB(watch);
		}

	}
